entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers near noon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 2 April 2023
